description:
In "Chickempic," the multiplayer mode of Viviter where you can play with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Back to the Chicken" mini-game!
To return to the original era, you must pass through the power lines at a specific speed.
That's right, I'm no longer a coward. I'll do it. I'll make it a success no matter what.
There's no more need for the past. Let's go back to where I belong. To the place where my loved ones are waiting!
name: Additional mini-game "Back to the Chicken"
